originalText.text: AMA at Manhattan is highly attractive for both professional as well as corporate meetings. We got floor diagrams properly designed for our event and we exactly followed the same setup to have a seamless meeting experience. We had great support from the AMA team from multiple visits of the venue till feedback phase. Ruben had gone above and beyond for an wonderful experience of our conference. We got tremendous help in finding other amenities such as hotel booking, entertainment, transportation, audio visual, parking etc. We highly recommend AMA for small to mid-scale conferences at the heart of Manhattan.

originalText.text: I recently held an event at the AMA Conference Center, and I must say it was an outstanding experience. The venue was well-equipped, and the attention to detail was impressive. Special thanks to Ruben Cobos, the Director and his staff for his excellent leadership and ensuring everything ran smoothly. I highly recommend this conference center for its professionalism and top-notch service!

text.text: I recently held an event at the AMA Conference Center, and I must say it was an outstanding experience. The venue was well-equipped, and the attention to detail was impressive. Special thanks to Ruben Cobos, the Director and his staff for his excellent leadership and ensuring everything ran smoothly. I highly recommend this conference center for its professionalism and top-notch service!

originalText.text: We have worked with Ruben at AMA Times Square for nearly a decade. He spends time working with you as a client to make sure all your needs are met. His team do great work with setup and scheduling. We have a lot of faculty that sometimes need A/V help and the AMA team is always happy to help. It is a great venue for any University that needs to offer extra classes or even graduation events.

originalText.text: I have worked with Ruben Cobos and his team for the past few years. My company holds our Annual Summer Safety Events at AMA's Facility. Ruben is always super responsive to my questions, as well as very accommodating to our needs. His team is very flexible and they work hard to ensure our events run smoothly. I highly recommend using their services!

Ruben is always super responsive to my questions, as well as very accommodating to our needs. His team is very flexible and they work hard to ensure our events run smoothly. I highly recommend using their services!

originalText.text:
We just hosted a weekend event here, and I can't say enough about how wonderful the staff was. Even with 150+ people in the space, the beverage center was always immaculate, there wasn't a single overfilled garbage can, the restrooms were always clean and well stocked, and any requests were quickly attended to.
The conference rooms are well appointed with A/V that made it easy to transition between in-person speakers' presentations, and allowed presenters to participate easily via Zoom.
The entire planning process was painless, and Ruben is a delight to work with. He is thoughtful and creative about set up, and excellent at anticipating needs; wonderfully professional, and warmly welcoming. Ruben and his staff are incredible, and we had a very successful event. We look forward to hosting events here again soon!
